title: Up-Pointing Small Red Triangle

adjectives: Situated at the top or highest position
nouns: A mark to indicate a direction or relation
A mark to indicate a direction or relation.
A sign or symbol used to indicate a direction (e.g. \to).

description:
A triangle-shaped arrow, pointing up. Styled similarly to the left and right triangles and colored as either gray or blue, but shown in orange on Android.

Previously displayed as red on Windows.
apple_vendor_description: On Apple devices, the upwards button emoji is a clean, minimalist representation of upward mobility and progression, featuring a crisp, bright white arrow within a softly rounded, light gray square. The subtle 3D shading and smooth gradients on Apple devices give it a polished and modern feel, suggesting a gentle push or an ascent. This emoji is commonly used to indicate moving up, increasing, advancing, or selecting an option to go higher in digital interfaces.
